data.name: BASS_UNABLE_TO_CREATE_STREAM_FROM_FILE
data.value: Bass was unable to create a stream from file '{0}'

data.name: CALIBRATION_REQUIRES_MANUAL_INTERACTION
data.value: Calibration cannot be completed without manual intervention, e.g. having to use a mouse. You may be stuck in the calibration process if you cannot manually interact with your computer. Are you sure you would like to re-calibrate?

data.name: CALIBRATION_STOPPED_MESSAGE
data.value: 알 수 없는 이유로 측정이 중단됬습니다. 메시지:'{0}'

data.name: COLLAPSED_DOCK_THICKNESS
data.value: Collapsed dock thickness (as % of full dock thickness):

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_MESSAGE
data.value:
OptiKey has detected that your user settings file has become corrupted and must be repaired. This will be done by restoring an old version, or a default version if that isn't possible.
Click Yes to reset your user settings and restart.
Click No to close so that you can manually repair or copy your user settings file.

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_TITLE
data.value: 이런! 사용자 설정 파일이 손상된 듯 합니다.

data.name: CRASH_MESSAGE
data.value:
Bad news - OptiKey has tripped over its feet and has to close down.
An email with details of what happened would be very helpful: optikeyfeedback@gmail.com
Sorry for the inconvenience.

data.name: DICTIONARY_FILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
data.value: 사용자 사전이 없고, 다음 경로에서 사전을 찾을 수 없습니다: '{0}'

data.name: DISPLAY_FOR_X_SECONDS_PER_CHARACTER_LABEL
data.value: Display for X seconds per message character:

data.name: INCOMPLETE_KEY_FIXATION_TTL_LABEL
data.value: Incomplete key fixation time to live (ms):

data.name: INTELLIGENTLY_SUPPRESS_AUTO_CAPS
data.value: ...but intelligently suppress auto-caps where it is probably unhelpful:

data.name: MINIMUM_DWELL_TIME_TO_INCLUDE_IN_CAPTURE
data.value: Minimum dwell time on a key to include in capture (ms):

data.name: NEW_DICTIONARY_ENTRY_WILL_CONTAIN_CAPITALS
data.value: (The new dictionary entry will contain capital letters)

data.name: NO_NEW_ENTRIES_IN_SCRATCHPAD
data.value: It doesn't look like the scratchpad contains any words or phrases that don't already exist in the dictionary.

data.name: PARENT_WINDOW_COULD_NOT_BE_FOUND
data.value: Parent Window could not be identified. Unable to continue

data.name: REQUIRED_SERVICES_NOT_PASSED_TO_MANAGEMENT_WINDOW
data.value: Audio and/or Dictionary service(s) were/was not supplied to the management window action.

data.name: RESTART_MESSAGE
data.value: OptiKey needs to restart to apply your changes. Please click OK to continue with the restart, or CANCEL to discard your changes

data.name: RESUMING_INCOMPLETE_KEY_FIXATION_REQUIRES_NEW_LOCK_ON_LABEL
data.value: Resuming an incomplete key fixation requires a new lock on:

data.name: SIMILAR_DICTIONARY_ENTRIES_EXIST
data.value: (FYI some similar entries are already in the dictionary: {0})

data.name: SUPPRESS_MODIFIERS_IN_MOUSE_KEYBOARD_LABEL
data.value: Suppress modifier keys when in mouse keyboard:

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_ACTIVATION_ERROR
data.value: Unable to activate TheEyeTribe GazeManager! Please check that the server is running and the device is connected and try again.

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_NOT_CALIBRATED
data.value: TheEyeTribe has not been calibrated. No data will be received until calibration is completed.

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_UNABLE_TO_CALIBRATE_NO_ENGINE
data.value: Unable to attempt a calibration as no EyeX engine is available.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_CALIBRATION_SUCCESS
data.value: Calibration completed, or possibly cancelled, but everything is working again!

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_ENGINE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Tobii EyeX Engine cannot be found. Please install the EyeX Engine and try again.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_ENGINE_NOT_RUNNING
data.value: Tobii EyeX Engine is not running. Please start the EyeX Engine and try again.

data.name: TRIGGER_WITHOUT_POSITION_ERROR
data.value: I can not detect where you are directing your attention. Is there a problem with the input device? Is it connected, turned on, calibrated, etc?

data.name: UNABLE_TO_DETERMINE_CURRENT_ELEVATION
data.value: Unable to determine the current elevation.

data.name: UNABLE_TO_SET_VOICE_WARNING
data.value: There was a problem setting the voice to '{0}'{1}

data.name: UNKNOWN_CALIBRATION_ERROR
data.value: Something went wrong, but I don't know what - please check the logs

data.name: URL_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT
data.value: Please visit www.optikey.org to download latest version ({0}) You can turn off update checks from the Management Console (ALT + M).

data.value: myGaze와 연결할 수 없습니다! 서버가 실행 중이고, 장치가 연결됬는지 다시 한 번 확인해주시기 바랍니다.
